title: Letterhead Fonts release Ragged Brad into the wild
content:
LHF Ragged Brad (NEW!)

Pin striper Brad King's first LHF font  
is complete. Having hand painting this  
freestyle script for years, it is now  
ready for you to use in your own projects.

CUSTOMERS ONLY:  
Receive $5 off LHF Ragged Brad until July 13.  
Use promo code: RAGBRAD

Check out samples and download it here:  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.shtml "http://letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.shtml")

-------------------------------------------

Free Letterhead Fonts Cap

Receive a beautiful embroidered cap with any order of $199 or more.  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/lhfstore/freecaps.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/lhfstore/freecaps.shtml "http://letterheadfonts.com/lhfstore/freecaps.shtml")

Choose "Letterhead Fonts Cap" when ordering.  
(Hurry though... only a few left!)

-------------------------------------------

Free Vector Panel

Receive this handy classic .eps vector panel with any order of $60 or more:  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/news/index.shtml?a=blog&id=39](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/news/index.shtml?a=blog&id=39 "http://letterheadfonts.com/news/index.shtml?a=blog&id=39")

-------------------------------------------

Package Prices Going Up!

Only one week until our Gold and Silver  
package prices increase. Create your own font package...

Silver Package 6/$149 (soon to be: 6/$159)  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/silverpackage.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/silverpackage.php "http://letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/silverpackage.php")

Gold Package 3/$99 (soon to be: 3/$119)  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/goldpackage.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/goldpackage.php "http://letterheadfonts.com/custompackages/goldpackage.php")

-------------------------------------------

Font of The Month

Get Dave Parr's LHF Squeezebox for only $33 until July 31st:  
 [http://letterheadfonts.com/fonts/squeezebox.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020182705/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/squeezebox.shtml "http://letterheadfonts.com/fonts/squeezebox.shtml")
author: Miss Tiffany
